page.title: 09PEOPLE OF BECKLEY & HORTON
page.content: Very many people in the area have lived in their present house for less than ten years. Although most of the people work in Oxford, a number work in Bicester and in the area itself. Some commute to London, Southampton and other places. By far the most popular way of travelling to work is by car. Our survey showed that 40% of the people did their main shopping for food in Headington. Other people shop in Oxford 18%, Wheatley 14%, Bicester 10%, and Horton-cum-Studley 7%. There is no shop in Beckley. The most popular pets are dogs and cats but chickens, horses, rabbits and fish are also popular. Other pets shown in our survey included ducks, guinea pigs, hamsters, donkeys and birds. 26% of the homes did not have any pets.
